hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local

Class LocalizationProviderBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.AbstractLocalizationProvider
      • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.local.LocalizationProviderBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizationProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormLocalizationProvider

    public class LocalizationProviderBridge
extends AbstractLocalizationProvider
    This class acts like a decorator for another ILocalizationProvider.
    Delegate provider is expected in the constructor and requests for translation are delegated to the given delegate.
    After creation of this object, method connect() should be called to register a listener to the given delegate provider so it can forward all notifications to the listeners registered to this object.
    disconnect() method is also available when notifications are no longer required.
    Author:
    Dan

        public LocalizationProviderBridge(ILocalizationProvider delegate)

        delegate - another ILocalizationProvider for delegating translation requests

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connects to the ILocalizationProvider given in the constructor. When connected all notifications from the provider will be forwarded to listeners registered on this object. If it is already connected, nothing happens.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects from the ILocalizationProvider given in the constructor. When disconnected, notifications from the provider will not be forwarded to the listeners registered on this object.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
        Description copied from interface: ILocalizationProvider
        Returns a locale-sensitive String based on current localization setting and given key.
        Parameters:
        key - key for identifying a unique String
        Returns:
        a locale-sensitive String

        Description copied from interface: ILocalizationProvider
